description: Creates a new landing zone. This API call starts an asynchronous operation that creates and configures a landing zone, based on the parameters specified in the manifest JSON file.

parameters.name: manifest
parameters.description: The manifest JSON file is a text file that describes your Amazon Web Services resources. For examples, review Launch your landing zone.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to be applied to the landing zone. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The landing zone version, for example, 3.0.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the landing zone resource.

nested_items.name: operationIdentifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier assigned to a CreateLandingZone operation. You can use this identifier as an input of GetLandingZoneOperation to check the operation's status.
